titles.title: For the relief of the estate of William R. Holden and the estate of John Davis.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/26/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to pay specified sums to the estates of two named individuals in full satisfaction of all claims of specified parties against the United States in connection with the incident which resulted in the individuals' deaths.
